Articles.Content:
Basically, after seeing all these rating threads, I thought that it's gonna overflow if we do nothing about it, and decided to make an in-general thread. Because reasons. So, here we go.

________________________________________________________________________________________
RULES:

      0. Don't be a (figurative) butt because seriously, that's important. Being a literal butt is allowed.

  1. Everything's allowed as long as it follows the forum rules and is SFW. Videos are allowed, but please be reasonable.
  2. Rate however you want because threads like these are as much for jokes as they are for honest rating. But don't forget the rating itself, topped off at 10, but the roof is very flimsy, so go up to eleven and beyond as you please.
  3. Please put large images under spoilers because some people surf the forums on mobile devices, and some already lag as bepis when trying to surf the internet in general.

________________________________________________________________________________________

I start with this little thing of mine, fueled by pure boredom and made with android.

 

Edited December 17, 2015 by DestinyPlayer

8/10. No idea what it is, but it's all glowy.

Intentionally Left Blank by Zuckervati Jones, on Flickr
10/10 Reminds me of an essay on laziness somebody wrote.
5/10 schizophrenic suicidal acceptance and delirium
10/10 I get it.... The prop plane is closer to the camera than the airliner.

10/10 HOLY GOD WHAT SIM IS THAT THE LEVEL OF DETAIL IS AWESOME I WANNA GET IT I-I WANNA GET IT-

Edited January 17, 2016 by 073198681
